headline: Home Depot (HD): Evaluating Valuation as Momentum Slows and Investor Focus Shifts
summary: Home Depot (HD) shares have moved slightly lower this week. With no headline news or major developments, investors are considering recent trends in consumer spending and the broader retail environment for clues on the path ahead. See our latest analysis for Home Depot. Home Depot’s recent dip in share price comes after a strong run over the past few years, with total shareholder returns up more than 44% over three years and nearly 59% over five. Short-term momentum has cooled, but long-term...

headline: Your Portfolio Is Not Ready for Retirement: 3 ETFs to Secure Your Financial Future
summary: Life insurance provider John Hancock just released its Longevity Preparedness Index, a survey to measure U.S. adults’ ability to live well in older age. It reveals a sobering reality: Americans score just 60 out of 100 in readiness for longer lifespans, with finances a glaring weak spot. As life expectancy rises — potentially doubling the ... headline: Plug Proves European Hydrogen Supply and Delivery Capabilities; Successfully Completes Deliveries to H2CAST Project, Signs New Contract for Additional 35 Tons
summary: On-time, successful delivery demonstrates scalability of Plug’s European hydrogen production capacity and trucking fleet to support Germany’s energy transitionSLINGERLANDS, N.Y., Oct. 21, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Plug Power Inc. (NASDAQ: PLUG), a global leader in comprehensive hydrogen solutions for the hydrogen economy, today announced the completion of the first phase of its hydrogen supply delivery of 44.5 metric tons for H2CAST (Hydrogen Cavern Storage Transition), a joint project led by Gas
